title: Beauty lies in the eyes of the beholder. Are my eyes racist? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s not racist to find one person more or less physically attractive. That’s just personal taste and you can do nothing about it. If you said “I hate all people who are {insert ethnicity} because they’re {insert adjective unrelated to appearance}” that would be racist but it would be your brain that was faulty, not your eyes.
